comment: Poverty is the cause of population and not vise versa. Countries with negative population growth have problems of unemployment, poverty. It's the capitalist system.
amr:
# ::snt Poverty is the cause of population and not vise versa. Countries with negative population growth have problems of unemployment, poverty. It's the capitalist system.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (p / poor)
            :ARG1 (p2 / population))
      :snt2 (c2 / cause-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (p3 / poor)
            :ARG1 p2
            :ARG1-of (c3 / contrast-01
                  :ARG2 (v / vise-value)))
      :snt3 (h / have-03
            :ARG0 (c4 / country
                  :ARG0-of (g / grow-01
                        :ARG1 (p4 / population)
                        :ARG0-of (n / negative-02)))
            :ARG1 (p5 / problem
                  :topic (a / and
                        :op1 (e / employ-01
                              :polarity -)
                        :op2 (p6 / poor))))
      :snt4 (s / system
            :mod (c5 / capitalist)
            :domain (ii / it)))
